document.full_text: parts of the mississippi and other rivers around minneapolis and st. paul could reach flood stage by the weekend as rising temperatures bring a sustained thaw, the national weather service said on monday.
document.title: warmer temperatures could start flooding in minnesota
lines_and_colors: parts of the mississippi and other rivers around minneapolis and st. paul could reach flood stage by the weekend as rising temperatures bring a sustained thaw, the national weather service said on monday.
